author: Nerdstalgic
description:
It’s impossible to hear the name Johnny Knoxville without instantly thinking of Jackass. From the groundbreaking MTV series to multiple hit movies and spin-offs, Knoxville and his fearless crew have entertained audiences with insane stunts and shock humor for over 25 years. But did you know he originally came to Hollywood with dreams of becoming a serious actor?  Unfortunately his skill set of putting himself in harms way for the amusement of others prevailed over any acting talent he might have had. 

💬 Do you think Johnny Knoxville could have made it as a serious actor? Let us know in the comments!

🔥 Like, subscribe, and hit the bell for more deep dives into Hollywood’s biggest careers!

#JohnnyKnoxville #Jackass #mtv  #stuntman  #nerdstalgic
title: Why Hollywood Won't Let Johnny Knoxville Be Anything But A Jackass
